truths.title: I am a child of God
truths.description: You belong to God's family by faith in Christ.

truths.title: I am loved
truths.description: God's love is for you and does not depend on performance.

truths.title: I am forgiven
truths.description: Through Christ, forgiveness is freely given.

truths.title: I am a citizen of heaven
truths.description: Your true home is with God in His kingdom.

truths.title: I am accepted
truths.description: You are accepted by God through Christ — not because of what you do but because of who He is.

truths.title: I am chosen
truths.description: God has chosen you for His purposes and calls you by name.

truths.title: I am never alone
truths.description: God is with you in every situation; you are not abandoned.

truths.title: I am redeemed
truths.description: Christ has redeemed you and set you free from the power of sin.

truths.title: I am a friend of God
truths.description: Jesus calls you friend and invites you into relationship and trust.

truths.title: I am God's ambassador
truths.description: You represent Christ to others and carry His message of reconciliation.

truths.title: I am free in Christ
truths.description: Freedom in Christ means freedom from guilt and a life lived for Him.

truths.title: I am royalty
truths.description: As God's child you share in His royal family and heavenly inheritance.

truths.title: I am made new
truths.description: In Christ you are a new creation — old things pass away, new life begins.

truths.title: I am safe
truths.description: God is your refuge and strength; you can trust His protection.

truths.title: I am renewed
truths.description: You are being renewed in the spirit of your mind by God's transforming work.

truths.title: I am blessed
truths.description: God has blessed you with every spiritual blessing in Christ.

truths.title: I have a purpose
truths.description: You are God's workmanship, created for good works and a purposeful life.
